pr_title: Use @long_test tag for more long tests

timeline.message: Use @long_test tag for more long tests

timeline.bodyText: Do we need buildhost tag here?
timeline.author: srbarrios
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -11,25 +11,24 @@
 # * if there is no private network ($private_net is nil)
 # * if there is no PXE boot minion ($pxeboot_mac is nil)
 
+@buildhost

replies.bodyText: Yes. You can't run the retail tests if you don't have an OS image, and the OS image needs the build host to be built.
replies.author: Bischoff
